bSACRx-y6.memHandModelNotes:
select all forest within 60m of open habitat within buffers above to include forests needed for shade.

I removed hand modeling for this species and changed open habitat to primary map units with a 60 meter buffer and forested habitats as auxiliary map units. MJR 7 March 2008.
